title: Coronavirus in Scotland: Who is Dr Gregor Smith?
description: The deputy chief medical officer will now lead the country's team of leading clinicians battling Covid-19.
content:
Image copyrightRealistic MedicineImage caption
 Dr Gregor Smith has been Scotland's deputy chief medical officer since 2015
On Saturday morning Dr Gregor Smith shared a picture of a soldier carrying a donkey through a minefield.
